name: Karoball
description:
A top-down multiplayer football game with the ability to play with different classes that have special attributes

Gameplay Controls Mouse

Sprint: Left click
Shoot: Right click

Keyboard

Movement: Arrow keys / WASD
Sprint: C / Q
Shoot: X / Spacebar

Other Controls

M:      Switch between mouse and keyboard controls
F:        Toggle fullscreen
N:       Mute / Unmute
ESC:  Exit game

Join The Discord https://discord.gg/JrtryAQe8k
